text: Mitsuishi District in Hidaka Subprefecture before merging with Shizuani District in 2006. was a district located in Hidaka Subprefecture, Hokkaido, Japan. As of 2004, the district had an estimated population of 4,950 and a density of 14.30 persons per km². The total area was 346.23 km². On March 31, 2006, Mitsuishi District merged with Shizunai District to create the new Hidaka District. Mitsuishi District and Shizunai District were both dissolved with this merger. ==Towns and villages== * Mitsuishi Category:Former districts of Hokkaido
title: Mitsuishi District, Hokkaido
